description: Exports an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) to a VM file. For more information, see Exporting a VM directly from an Amazon Machine Image (AMI) in the VM Import/Export User Guide.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Token to enable idempotency for export image requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: S3ExportLocation
parameters.description: The Amazon S3 bucket for the destination image. The destination bucket must exist. The destination Amazon S3 bucket. S3Prefix (string) --- The prefix (logical hierarchy) in the bucket.

nested_params.name: S3Prefix
nested_params.description: The prefix (logical hierarchy) in the bucket.

parameters.name: TagSpecifications
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the export image task during creation. (dict) --- The tags to apply to a resource when the resource is being created. When you specify a tag, you must specify the resource type to tag, otherwise the request will fail. ResourceType (string) --- The type of resource to tag on creation. Tags (list) --- The tags to apply to the resource. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:. Value (string) --- The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_params.name: ResourceType
nested_params.description: The type of resource to tag on creation.

nested_params.name: Tags
nested_params.description: The tags to apply to the resource.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag. Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 127 Unicode characters. May not begin with aws:.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag. Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the image being exported.

nested_items.name: DiskImageFormat
nested_items.description: The disk image format for the exported image.

nested_items.name: ExportImageTaskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the export image task.

nested_items.name: RoleName
nested_items.description: The name of the role that grants VM Import/Export permission to export images to your Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Progress
nested_items.description: The percent complete of the export image task.

nested_items.name: S3ExportLocation
nested_items.description: Information about the destination Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: S3Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix (logical hierarchy) in the bucket.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the export image task. The possible values are active, completed, deleting, and deleted.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for the export image task.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Any tags assigned to the export image task.
